name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NirvanaSurf: Adult and Scam Website Blocker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 18+ Adult and Scam Website Blocker. It doesn't affect normal browsing, so feel free and enjoy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on a worry-free online journey with NirvanaSurf, the ultimate Chrome extension for a secure and tailored browsing experience. Bid farewell to unwanted 18+ adult content and scams with our robust features designed to put you in control.

Key Features:

🌐 Smart Domain Blocking: NirvanaSurf doesn't just block websites – it blocks entire domains. Bid farewell to related 18+ adult and scam domains, securing your online sanctuary comprehensively.

🔒 Privacy Assurance: Rest easy knowing that NirvanaSurf prioritizes your privacy. We do not collect any type of data from our users. Your online journey remains yours alone. Download now and experience browsing without compromise.

🚫 Powerful Blocklist: NirvanaSurf comes armed with an extensive blocklist, shielding you from a vast array of 18+ adult and scam websites effortlessly.

🔗 Customizable Control: Tailor your protection with ease. Add your own 18+ adult and scam websites to block and stay one step ahead of unwanted content.

🚧 Fine-Tuned Exceptions: Worried about false positives? NirvanaSurf allows you to add exceptions, ensuring your favorite sites remain accessible.

🖥️ Dashboard Mastery: Navigate your protective fortress seamlessly with our user-friendly dashboard. Manage your blocked 18+ adult and scam websites and exceptions effortlessly.

Experience the tranquility of NirvanaSurf. Download now and take charge of your internet experience, because online nirvana begins with smart browsing.

Important Note: Don't forget to allow NirvanaSurf in your private browsing mode (Incognito). Maintain your online privacy effortlessly.
